title: Your hair and scalp
creator_credit: World Wide, Hindle Marriott Edgar and Ken Woodward
brief_description: Animated diagrams showing the structure of hair, the process of growth and how to care for one’s hair. Natural variations of hair are shown and artificial treatments. The importance of cleanliness and good grooming in maintaining both health and appearance is emphasised.
